attributes.action: To give employees with under a years service the same rights as those with over a years service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give employees with under a years service the same rights as those with over a years service, with regards to unfair dismissal. So many employers are getting away with sacking peaople for no reason and hiring and firing all the time to avoid the employee having any rights! Lets put a stop to it NOW!
